input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Chapin Industrial 3-Gallon Viton Cleaner/Degreaser Sprayer 2236

Item features:
Cleaner/degreaser sprayer designed for tougher spraying applications
Adjustable poly cone nozzle sprays coarse stream to a fine mist
SealTite acid and chemical-resistant seals and gaskets
Wide opening design for easy filling and cleaning
Lock-off feature prevents accidental discharge
3-gallon poly viton tank

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
GUND Dakota Horse Plush - A huggable version of every little girl’s dream. As an adorable addition to our Rootin Tootin Cowgirl collection, Dakota The Horse is sure to be a loyal pal for years to come. Tacked up with a smile in pink gingham style, Dakota celebrates the spirit of the American West with the unparalleled softness and huggability of an award-winning GUND plush.  For over 100 years, GUND has made itself known the world over for their beloved plush designs. Made with premium materials. Ages 1+. 

Dimensions: Length 11in (28 cm)
input_text.Response B: Get tough on grime and grease with the Chapin Industrial 3-Gallon Viton Cleaner/Degreaser Sprayer 2236. This powerful sprayer is designed for tougher spraying applications and features an adjustable poly cone nozzle that sprays from a coarse stream to a fine mist. With SealTite acid and chemical-resistant seals and gaskets, you can tackle even the toughest cleaning jobs with ease. The wide opening design allows for easy filling and cleaning, and the lock-off feature prevents accidental discharge. The 3-gallon poly viton tank ensures you have enough solution for big jobs.
